1111010001111001 1101111001001010 1 -> sum: 1101001011000100, cout: 1
1101110101110101 0001001110111110 1 -> sum: 1111000100110100, cout: 0
1111001000010010 1011000100111010 0 -> sum: 1010001101001100, cout: 1
0011000011010110 0101101100100110 1 -> sum: 1000101111111101, cout: 0
1110011000110111 1100000000110100 0 -> sum: 1010011001101011, cout: 1
0001111000001010 0110100110110000 0 -> sum: 1000011110111010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1

1111111111111111 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
